notes: Very modern, high-end renovation with stylish marble-effect tile flooring, recessed lighting, and quality furnishings throughout. Spacious living and dining areas with good natural light. The apartment appears clean and well-maintained with multiple bedrooms including a master suite. For baby safety, note the glass display shelves in the living room and mirrored wardrobe doors that may need childproofing; no visible balcony railings or stairs in images.
